title: Last of Us HBO Show First Look: Everything We Want?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.22.22
description:
Blessing and Tim talk Saints Row reviews and whether or not this is the end of the franchise, Last of Us hbo's first trailer, and every game under the sun is getting adapted into a tv show or movie so Geoff Keighley's making an award for it.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:17 - Housekeeping
A new Gamescast is up right now and it’s our Saints Row review! You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.
Tomorrow we’re reacting to Gamescom Opening Night Live. That’s happening right here on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames at 11am sharp right after KFGD.
Our Screencast review for the first episode of the Game of Thrones Prequel, House of the Dragon, is up today over on YouTube.com/KindaFunny and on podcast services when you search for Kinda Funny Screencast!
The Roper Report   -
00:07:38 - Saints Row Review Round Up
00:22:50 - The Last of Us HBO show gets a First Look Teaser
00:31:54 - Sony is reportedly making a ‘Days Gone’ movie
00:36:21 -  Ad
00:37:21 - Sony is making a Gravity Rush movie
00:41:15 - Sega’s making Space Channel 5 and Comix Zone movies
00:47:26 - Ubisoft denies they’re making a Blade game
00:52:55 - A Destiny 2 and Fortnite crossover has leaked
00:53:57 - MultiVersus surpasses 20 million players
00:54:25 - The Game Awards has announced its date
01:00:19 - Sony is being sued for £5 billion over its online PlayStation Store prices
01:02:57 - Out today
01:03:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Bless
